data.name: Advent Heroes
data.detailed_description:
None would speak of her origin, though in time she would know what made her different. But for Nefersila, it was evident that she wasn’t to know the whole story of her past. Yet on the same night that her protection was ascribed, strangers from beyond the great expanse would forge a path to Runeria as the result of an initial breach of the isekai effect… one foretold by ancient writings as the first sign of the coming of the Great Advent. Utilizing the resources provided by these distant associates, Nefersila soon discoverers that the stakes are higher than even she had anticipated…

  • CLASSIC DESIGN: A full, retro-style roleplay experience with gameplay and presentation echoing the greatest tales ever told.
  • PERSONALITY MATTERS: No actions-say-everything leadership here - in this adventure, EVERYONE has a say in the mission to come.
  • FIGHT TO SURVIVE: Balance lifeforce and mana charge against your resources in choosing attack skills over party protection.
  • SHOW NO MERCY: Charge up your advent essence and cut loose with special abilities that can turn the tide back in your favor.
  • RESTORE ORDER: From an exile by consequence to an ominous dark threat, any situation is fair game for a decisive resolution.
  • GLOBAL TEAMWORK: Put your skills to the test with other players from around the world in challenging online expeditions.
